thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 9 of 657
thread.title: Robert C
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Robert C

author: Robert C
title: Robert C
text:
high quality work, once complete
helpful, patient staff
committed to satisfaction - adjustment needed to be made in the progressive segment height, but lenses were replaced no questions asked
lenses were not polished so had to send back, but issue was resolved as promised
also frames had a subtle flaw which I did not like and they were replaced without issue
saved money over buying local
took some some to get everything corrected but would use frames direct again
